{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = The Loremaster's spectre | class = AlienSpectre5 | game = Strife | doomednum = 168 | convid = 73 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SpectralMonster|SpectralMonster]]→[[Classes:AlienSpectre1|AlienSpectre1]]→AlienSpectre5
The Spectre possessing the [[Classes:Loremaster|Loremaster]]. This is the toughest spectre of all five, and fires Sigil 5 blasts. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR AlienSpectre5 : {{Class|AlienSpectre1}} { {{Property|Health}} 2000 {{Property|PainChance}} 50 {{Property|Radius}} 24 {{Property|DropItem}} "{{Class|Sigil5}}" States { Missile: ALN1 F 4 [[A_FaceTarget]] ALN1 I 4 [[A_CustomMissile]]("{{Class|SpectralLightningBigBall2}}", 32, 0) ALN1 E 4 Goto See+10 } }
